    public abstract class SingleMetricAbstractOplet<T>
extends Peek<T>
    Base for metrics oplets which use a single metric object.

        public java.lang.String getMetricName()
        Returns the name of the metric used by this oplet for registration. The name uniquely identifies the metric in the MetricRegistry.
